about_the_game: This DLC restores the illustrations of several adults scenes which were censored in the original game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC is intended only for adults 18 years of age or older.
It contains images of Scenes of Sex, including non-consensual ones.

detailed_description: This DLC restores the illustrations of several adults scenes which were censored in the original game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 1.5GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core at 1.5GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Project Vostok: 18+ Adult Only Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 1.5GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: WARNING: This DLC is intended only for adults 18 years of age or older. This DLC restores the censored adult scenes.
